body:
Hello Folks of Avicus,

I have been wanting to do this for ages and now I am doing it. A Build Server well not really because this has SG, Survival, Parkour and PvP but this is been opened to the public FOR A BUILD SERVER so you can join if you message me on skype or Rilo.


Rilos' Skype: rilomilothe9123
Mwas' Skype: live:xingzheng100

Staff:
Owner(s): rilomilo9 

Co-Owner(s): CozzehPvP and Crazy2_ (Never plays avicus)

Manager(s): urbansniper10, WezPvP_ (Never plays avicus)

and thats it for the team but we also have Jr Mod, Mod and Sr Mod

Rules:
1.  No griefing other users builds (I have a backup so there is no point)
2. Usual Rules: Spamming, Scamming, Hacking, Ban Evading and so on
3. No claiming others Builds
